rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Most of the White Whale's lifepods
didn't survive the crash...like this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0002
rows.name: You're one of the lucky few...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0003
rows.name: Rightâ€”you don't even remember the White Whale, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
You know, the L-002? The ship we escaped Earth on?
You...remember Earth, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0005_2
rows.name: Or rather, it used to be, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Unfortunately, It was caught in a battle
between two alien forces...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Don't feel bad. It's one memory I'd like to forget.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0010
rows.name: I know. It's been following me for a while now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
I didn't want to alarm you,
but we're going to need to defend ourselves.[ST:wait ]
